ul.li: This manual provides detailed instructions for using the QNAP Enterprise Storage NAS.
The QNAP Enterprise Storage NAS is hereafter referred to as the ES NAS or the NAS.
This manual provides the description of all the functions of the ES NAS.
This manual assumes that is already fully deployed.
